page.title: 12A RIVER JOURNEY, LINCOLN.
page.content: Heading eastwards along the {River {Witham}from{Brayford Pool,}the journey takes you through the centre of the city. The Brayford narrows into the Witham outside Sainsbury's. You then pass under {Wigford Way }carrying traffic to all points west.Through the {Glory Hole, High Bridge }is reached, supporting a splendid Medieval house. Emerging onto the {Waterside}you are flanked by the new C and A building, the Market and the Super Coop to the south and the less attractive Woolworths and the ABC cinema to the north.The{Green Dragon pub}is the last building before you pass under{Thorn {bridge }into the industrial area, including iron and engineering works. The river level drops through{Stamp {End Lock.}A redundant power station dominates the sky line.The countryside appears around the next bend.
